title: Stardock DeskScapes 2.0 + 75 Wallpaper Dreams [3trn1ty]
description:
*******************************************************************************
               Stardock DeskScapes 2.0 + 75 Wallpaper Dreams
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Wallpapers
Platform.............: Windows Vista
Version: DeskScapes 2.0
Developer: Stardock

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Post Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Posted by............: 3trn1ty
Posted on............: 11/11/2008

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Stardock DeskScapes is a program that allows users to have animated wallpaper
on their Windows Vista desktop. It supports playing video as animated
wallpaper, dynamically generated content as animated wallpaper, and more.

Included are 75 dreams several of which are premium dreams created by 
TheMasterBaron including:

Asteroids (Master Skin award from wincustomize.com)
Clockmaker's Nightmare
Crystal Island
Fire Storm
Fractal Foutain
Good Night Earth
Red Giant (Master Skin award from wincustomize.com)
Red Sea
Scribble Rays Blue
Scribble Rays Green
Solar Flare
Spiral Ghost
Spirit Dance
Streams
The Rift
Trippin
Tunnel of Love
Under Water
Utopia Prime (Master Skin award from wincustomize.com)
and Welcome to the Machine

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Install Stardock DeskScapes 2.0
2. Copy all the .Dream files to your Stardock Dreams folder.
   Usually User/Documents/Stardock/Dreams by default.
3. Right click your desktop, select Personalize, click Desktop Background,
   click the down arrow on the Picture Location drop-down box and select
   DeskScapes Animated Wallpapers. Choose a wallpaper.
4. Enter the following into the window that pops up:

   Email : <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="14667b767166604b607c75777f716626242420546d757c7b7b3a777b79">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

   Serial Number : B4E03-985DE-6D3FF-BC262-B509B-E195C

5. That's it! Enjoy!
